title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not getting refreshed. The original image continues to be displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the new image should be displayed after importing it into the layout.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Import the new 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
2. Verify that the original image is still being displayed instead of the new image.
